message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.IT, cs.RO 

The paper deals with the problem of Service Chain (SC) mapping in a Wide Area Network (WAN), which involves the placement of Virtual Network Functions (VNFs) and routing of traffic flows through them. This problem is related to network infrastructure (NI) and data communication (DC) as it involves the optimization of network resources. It also involves the optimization of service instances (SI) and information theory (IT) as it aims to minimize network resource consumption. Additionally, the paper proposes a two-phase column-generation-based model and solution, which is related to robotics (RO) as it involves optimization and decision-making.
